data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4.1, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: It gets added to a random image.
data.expected_result: The comment should be added to the first uploaded file.
data.short_description: Comment gets added to a random image when uploading multiple ones
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the iOS photos app - Select multiple photos - Click on the share button - Select Discord - Add a comment - Upload them to Discord - Try it again to see the difference
